- Examined providers: Anthropic (chat/handler.py), Azure (completion/handler.py)
- Documented interface requirements and transformation pattern
- Confirmed custom parameter support via optional_params dict
- Confirmed TLS configuration via httpx client sessions
- Decision: Provider location litellm/llms/asksage/
- Decision: Authentication via Bearer token in headers
- Decision: Custom params for dataset and persona support

Phase 1.1 and 1.2 completed successfully. Ready for Phase 2 implementation.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update P1 plan: Completed Phase 1.3 requirements mapping

- Reviewed ASKSAGE_API.md and CAPRA_ENDPOINT.md documentation
- Created comprehensive API parameter mapping table
- Documented required vs. optional vs. deferred features
- Clarified authentication: Bearer token for both standard and CAPRA
- Clarified TLS: DoD CA chain required for CAPRA only
- Mapped LiteLLM parameters to AskSage API parameters
- Identified environment variables: ASKSAGE_API_KEY, ASKSAGE_API_BASE, ASKSAGE_CA_CERT_PATH
- Defined model naming convention: asksage/{model_name}
- Decided on initial scope: text-only /server/query endpoint
- Deferred file upload and streaming to Phase 2.2

Phase 1 (Research & Setup) completed successfully! Ready for Phase 2 implementation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add AskSage provider for LiteLLM

Implements AskSage/CAPRA provider to enable access to AskSage endpoints
through LiteLLM''s unified interface.

**Provider Structure:**
- litellm/llms/asksage/common_utils.py - Error handling
- litellm/llms/asksage/chat/transformation.py - Request/response transformation
- litellm/llms/asksage/chat/handler.py - Main completion handler
- litellm/llms/asksage/__init__.py - Provider exports

**Features:**
- Bearer token authentication (standard AskSage and CAPRA)
- DoD TLS certificate support for CAPRA endpoints
- Text-only completion via /server/query endpoint
- Model selection and temperature control
- Custom parameters: dataset (RAG context), persona
- Token usage tracking
- Async completion support

**Configuration:**
- ASKSAGE_API_KEY - Bearer token for authentication
- ASKSAGE_API_BASE - Base URL (default: CAPRA endpoint)
- ASKSAGE_CA_CERT_PATH - DoD CA certificate chain (CAPRA only)

**Usage:**
```python
from litellm import completion

response = completion(
    model="asksage/google-claude-4-opus",
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Hello!"}],
    dataset=["ds_12345"],  # Optional RAG context
    persona="researcher"   # Optional AI personality
)
```

**Registered:**
- Added ASKSAGE to LlmProviders enum
- Added routing logic in main.py
- Added model definitions in __init__.py

Closes #1 for MARS project integration
EOF
)")
